title: Oregon National Historic Trail: Challenge Cost Share Program
body: Challenge Cost Share Program       The National Park Service Challenge Cost Share Program provides up to $25,000 in matching funds to support projects that promote conservation and recreation, environmental stewardship, education, and engaging diverse youth participants in national parks, trails, heritage areas, and wild and scenic rivers. For more information visit: http://www.nps.gov/orgs/1453/ccsp.htm
